snippet: As part of the New York Philharmonic’s October residency at the University of Michigan, members of the brass section will join the Michigan Marching Band during halftime of the homecoming game against Northwestern.
abstract: As part of the New York Philharmonic’s October residency at the University of Michigan, members of the brass section will join the Michigan Marching Band during halftime of the homecoming game against Northwestern.

headline.print_headline: Philharmonic Brass On a Football Field
